attributes.action: Get Rid of Loop Holes in Tax System
attributes.additional_details:
Stop Wealthy people i.e Celebrities, Musicians, business owners avoiding paying tax by living abroad for so many months of the year.

If you earn money in this country you pay tax on it unless you are on a low income.

Put a limit on how much tax can be claimed back.

If you have companies in this country but don't live here at all you should still pay tax.

Tax should be unavoidable for people who earn money in this country whether you live here or not.
